tuv.seg: Sean works 43 hours per week including three hours on a Saturday
Oibríonn Seán 43 uaireanta in aghaidh na seachtaine ina áirítear trí uair a' chloig ar an Satharn
He is entitled to the minimum wage of €9.25 as he is an experienced adult employee and isn't on a training or study course
Tá sé i dteideal íosphá de €9.25 toisc gur fostaí aosach taithíthe é agus níl sé ar chúrsa oiliúna ná staidéir
He is paid a gross wage of €400 per week
Íoctar ollphá de €400 in aghaidh na seachtaine leis
Sean's pay includes a €20 premium for working Saturdays
Cuimsítear táille €20 sa phá do Sheán as ucht oibriú Dé Sathairn
He asked his employer about the national minimum wage and his employer gave him the following information:
D'iarr sé ar a fhostóir faoin íosphá náisiúnta agus thug a fhostóir an teolas a leanas dó:
• The pay reference period is weekly
• Tá an tréimhse tagartha pá ar bhonn seachtainiúil
• Dividing the gross pay (€400) by the hours worked (43), this gives an average hourly pay of €9.30
• Má roinntear an t-ollphá (€400) ar na huaireanta a oibríodh (43), tugann sé seo meánráta pá de €9.30 in aghaidh na huaire
This is slightly above the current national minimum wage of €9.25 per hour
Tá sé seo beagán os cionn an íosráta pá náisiúnta de €9.25 in aghaidh na huaire
Is Sean's employer correct?
An bhfuil fostóir Seán ceart?
No, Sean's employer is incorrect
Níl, tá fostóir Seán mícheart
The €20 premium for working on Saturdays should not be included for national minimum wage purposes
Níor chóir go gcuimseofaí an táille €20 as ucht oibriú Dé Sathairn do chuspóirí an íosphá náisiúnta
This means that only €380 should be divided by 43, giving an average hourly pay of €8.84 - below the national minimum wage of €9.25
Ciallaíonn sé seo gur cheart €380 amháin a roinnt ar 43, ag tabhairt meánráta pá de €8.84 - taobh thíos den íosphá náisiúnta ag €9.25
Sean's entitlement is a basic wage of €397.75 (€9.25 x 43) plus €20 Saturday premium which comes to a total of €417.75
Is bunphá de €397.75 (€9.25 x 43) móide €20 mar tháille an Sathairn atá mar theidlíocht ag Seán a thagann go dtí iomlán de €417.75
